title: Cool!
comment: A must have app if you are a student or a professional and have to keep your phone silent for a large part of the day. Truly a boon! Thx Mr. Ayron

title: Great Disaster & Recovery Utility
comment: Versatile and efficient app for my tool bag. Delivers peace of mind when you have too much on your plate and become forgetful.  Love the options to choose the ring sound and locking feedback. Dedicated developer promptly responded to my issue. RDD is a keeper. Thank you Ayron Jungren.

title: Truly Great!
comment: One of the best no frills remote ringers out there. Once you use it, you wont go back. Its nice to see a true free app out there without ads.

title: Mr. Oregon
comment: Does not work with HTC My Touch 4G..  Great idea now fix it.

title: 5 Stars!!
comment: Finally something to help find a lost phone! This app has been extremely helpful!!  Now if only it were possible for T.V remotes.
